content: why settle on one shade when you can show off your duo personality with ease stitched in durable red heart super saver this hat features a quick rib pattern that stitches from side to side for a comfy fit the top is worked using half_double_crochet in third loop ribbing finished with slip stitches while the bold color change is introduced halfway through get inspired with 3 versions or create your own by selecting from over 100 colors available in this yarn materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m version 1 contrast a pretty n pink 0722 1 ball contrast b gold 0321 1 ball version 2 contrast a tea leaf 0624 1 ball contrast b medium thyme 0406 1 ball version 3 contrast a minty 0520 1 ball contrast b pale plum 0579 1 ball note 2 balls 1 each shade will make 3 hats size one size to fit adult
